Name: AppName
Comment: Base package name (e.g 7zip) (Required) (Remove ! Character which hides sample apps)

Name: AppVersion
Comment: Package version (nothing to do with product version) (e.g. 100 for 7zip-v100) (Recommended)

Name: AppInstaller
Comment: (required) winget,choco,exe,msi,ps1,cmd. If winget, choco is used, leave AppUninstallName blank unless you want to uninstall an additional app

Name: AppInstallName
Comment: winget appid (case sensitive) or choco appid or filename of .exe or .msi or .ps1 or .cmd (wildcard OK). See https://winstall.app or https://community.chocolatey.org/packages for package ids.

Name: AppInstallArgs
Comment: Installer arguments for msi,ps1,exe,cmd (for .msi usually /quiet or /q /norestart)

Name: AppDescription
Value: Simple tool to show neighboring devices on your network.
Comment: Info for company portal (required)

Name: AppUninstallName
Comment: (Optional) AddRemove Program Name (winget id - see winget list). App to uninstall (also done prior to install). This is in addition to the normal choco,winget uninstall. Uses winget to uninstall (winget list myproductid -e)

Name: AppUninstallVersion
Comment: (Optional) AddRemove Product version below which to Uninstall (e.g. 4.5.0). Detection: versions below this will not be considered Detected. Blank=Any version is detected. Use this to repackage an app to upgrade everyone to latest version.

Name: AppUninstallProcess
Comment: (Optional) Processes to end prior to uninstall. Acrob* style is OK. Show running names via: get-process -Name Acrob*

Name: SystemOrUser
Comment: System to install as system, User to install as user

Name: Publisher
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: RestartBehavior
Comment: Allow Installer to Restart (Default is allow)

Name: Developer
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: Owner
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: Notes
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: InformationURL
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: PrivacyURL
Comment: Info for company portal

Name: CompanyPortalFeaturedApp
Comment: Company Portal Featured (Default is FALSE)

Name: AvailableInCompanyPortal
Comment: Company Portal Availability (Default is TRUE)

Name: PublishToOrgGroup
Comment: When uploaded to Intune, the PublishToGroup values from the AppsPublish_OrgList.csv will be used to push this to the Group as a required app. False means do not publish.

Name: AppVar1
Comment: Custom var useable by ps1 files

Name: AppVar2
Comment: Custom var useable by ps1 files

Name: AppVar3
Comment: Custom var useable by ps1 files

Name: AppVar4
Comment: Custom var useable by ps1 files

Name: AppVar5
Comment: Custom var useable by ps1 files
